bibl.title: Jews in a Graeco-Roman World
bibl.note: The diversity and fluidity manifested in the documents from the Judaean Desert (70-135 A.D.) are the best evidence we have for the state of Jewish law and the authority exercised by the rabbis at the time.
COTTON Hannah M., The Rabbis and the Documents.
Martin GOODMAN (Ed.), Jews in a Graeco-Roman World (Oxford, 1998) pp. 167-179.
